title: 202. Spire Crossing
content:
IF YOU ARE ON SPIRE UNDER ATTACK!, GO TO 1.224OTHERWISE READ:

A long bridge of gray stone arches over the glistening waters of the Silverfin—the only major crossing leading in or out of the bustling village of Spire. It's customary for travelers along the bridge to stop and greet one another as they pass. Several travelers are already engaged in lively conversation, in no particular rush to get to where they're headed.

If you are on SUPPLY RUN or RETURN TRIP, do not shuffle Raemon, Caravaneer into the path deck.
